description: System-generated unique identifier for each datatype option record; serves as the primary key for joins and lookups.
Stable identifier for the datatype option, typically a technical or business key used to reference the option across systems.
Human-readable explanation of the datatype option; likely mirrors the technical identifier in this dataset; confirm with SME.
Coded category for the option, indicating how the data is represented or sourced; values are enumerations; exact code set and meaning should be confirmed with SME.
Stored value for the option, such as a code or underlying data type designation, used by the application to control validation, storage, or transformation behavior.
